short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add percentage tools to assessment grading: see calculated percentage grade and adjust overall grade by a percentage increment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brightspace Percentager adds percentage tools to assessment grading in the Assignment Evaluation of the D2L Brightspace Learning Management System. It displays the calculated percentage grade next to the point-based grade. It also adds the ability to adjust the overall grade by a percentage amount (useful for applying a late penalty).
